description:
Shoot McMahon (シュート=マクマホン) is an Unidentified Beast Hunter with one arm and Morel`s pupil. Shoot`s Nen ability is Dark Inn: Hotel Rafflesia (暗い宿) and involves manipulating a cage and three disembodied hands that levitate. Shoot can shrink and seal off what is hit by his hands, in the cage. He has a timid personality and is often afraid of taking advantage of opportune times to attack his enemy.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Shoot McMahon
